pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 24, 2016 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, August 24, 2016:

Ottawa, Ontario

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver remarks at the Unifor Convention.

Canada Hall
Shaw Centre
55 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open media coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 9:30 a.m.


PMO Media Relations:
media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca
613-957-5555
